= debugging with vim =
Due to async limitations debugging can be implemented using either
client-server feature or polling (waiting for data to arrive) - which usually
is implemented using python. A lot of details can be found in the documentation
of the {{http://github.com/MarcWebervim-addon-async}} plugin.

clewn is a special vim distribution having some gdb related patches.
There are multiple multi purpose debuggers such as vdebug.

Except that have a look at the notes found in the languages/* files.
